title: Newsletter BitAgora

title: AI as the greatest source of empowerment for all
description: I’ve always considered myself a pragmatic technologist—someone who loves technology not for its own sake, but for the direct impact it can have on people’s lives. That’s what makes this job so exciting, since I believe AI will unlock more opportunities for more people than any other technology in hi

title: A $50 million fund to build with communities
description: OpenAI is launching an initial $50 million fund that supports nonprofit and community organizations, informed by the independent OpenAI Nonprofit Commission report.

title: ChatGPT agent System Card
description: ChatGPT agent System Card: OpenAI’s agentic model unites research, browser automation, and code tools with safeguards under the Preparedness Framework.

title: Introducing ChatGPT agent
description: Introducing ChatGPT agent: it thinks and acts, using tools to complete tasks like research, bookings, and slideshows—all with your guidance.

title: Invideo AI uses OpenAI models to create videos 10x faster
description: Invideo AI uses OpenAI’s GPT-4.1, gpt-image-1, and text-to-speech models to transform creative ideas into professional videos in minutes.

title: OpenAI nonprofit jam
description: At OpenAI, we build tools to help people solve hard problems—including nonprofits working on the frontlines of their communities. The OpenAI Academy is teaming up with the Walton Family Foundation, Emerson Collective, and a network of local nonprofit organizations to host the Nonprofit Jam—a one-day

title: Statement from the OpenAI Board of Directors on the Nonprofit Commission Report
description: The Board of Directors thanks the members of the independent OpenAI Nonprofit Commission for their extensive work and engagement.

title: Agent bio bug bounty call
description: OpenAI invites researchers to its Bio Bug Bounty. Test the ChatGPT agent’s safety with a universal jailbreak prompt and win up to $25,000.

title: Intellectual freedom by design
description: ChatGPT is designed to be useful, trustworthy, and adaptable—so you can make it your own.

title: The EU Code of Practice and future of AI in Europe
description: OpenAI joins the EU Code of Practice, advancing responsible AI while partnering with European governments to drive innovation, infrastructure, and economic growth.

title: Causal Reasoning in Pieces: Modular In-Context Learning for Causal Discovery

title: DICE: Dynamic In-Context Example Selection in LLM Agents via Efficient Knowledge Transfer
description:
arXiv:2507.23554v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Large language model-based agents, empowered by in-context learning (ICL), have demonstrated strong capabilities in complex reasoning and tool-use tasks. However, existing works have shown that the effectiveness of ICL is highly sensitive to the choic

title: Semantic Chain-of-Trust: Autonomous Trust Orchestration for Collaborator Selection via Hypergraph-Aided Agentic AI
description:

Abstract: In collaborative systems, the effective completion of tasks hinges on task-specific trust evaluations of potential devices for distributed collaboration. However, the complexity of tasks, the spatiotemporal dynamism of distributed device resources, an

title: MemoCue: Empowering LLM-Based Agents for Human Memory Recall via Strategy-Guided Querying
description:
arXiv:2507.23633v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Agent-assisted memory recall is one critical research problem in the field of human-computer interaction. In conventional methods, the agent can retrieve information from its equipped memory module to help the person recall incomplete or vague memorie

title: TextQuests: How Good are LLMs at Text-Based Video Games?
description:
arXiv:2507.23701v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Evaluating AI agents within complex, interactive environments that mirror real-world challenges is critical for understanding their practical capabilities. While existing agent benchmarks effectively assess skills like tool use or performance on struc

title: Seed-Prover: Deep and Broad Reasoning for Automated Theorem Proving
description:
arXiv:2507.23726v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: LLMs have demonstrated strong mathematical reasoning abilities by leveraging reinforcement learning with long chain-of-thought, yet they continue to struggle with theorem proving due to the lack of clear supervision signals when solely using natural l

title: CoT-Self-Instruct: Building high-quality synthetic prompts for reasoning and non-reasoning tasks
description:
arXiv:2507.23751v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: We propose CoT-Self-Instruct, a synthetic data generation method that instructs LLMs to first reason and plan via Chain-of-Thought (CoT) based on the given seed tasks, and then to generate a new synthetic prompt of similar quality and complexity for u

title: SimuRA: Towards General Goal-Oriented Agent via Simulative Reasoning Architecture with LLM-Based World Model
description:
arXiv:2507.23773v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: AI agents built on large language models (LLMs) hold enormous promise, but current practice focuses on a one-task-one-agent approach, which not only falls short of scalability and generality, but also suffers from the fundamental limitations of autore

title: OAEI-LLM-T: A TBox Benchmark Dataset for Understanding Large Language Model Hallucinations in Ontology Matching
description:
arXiv:2503.21813v3 Announce Type: cross 
Abstract: Hallucinations are often inevitable in downstream tasks using large language models (LLMs). To tackle the substantial challenge of addressing hallucinations for LLM-based ontology matching (OM) systems, we introduce a new benchmark dataset OAEI-LLM-

title: Evaluating LLMs for Visualization Generation and Understanding
description:
arXiv:2507.22890v1 Announce Type: cross 
Abstract: Information Visualization has been utilized to gain insights from complex data. In recent times, Large Language models (LLMs) have performed very well in many tasks. In this paper, we showcase the capabilities of different popular LLMs to generate c

title: Mark Zuckerberg says ‘developing superintelligence is now in sight,’ shades OpenAI and other firms focused on automating work
description: So perhaps, these competing visions of superintelligence are actually far more similar than they are opposed.

title: C8 Health started with an AI that gives anesthesiologists guidance on demand — now it’s targeting whole hospitals
description: A friendly red panda avatar serves up the knowledge from the organization's own siloed databases, complete with citations

title: Google DeepMind says its new AI can map the entire planet with unprecedented accuracy
description: Google DeepMind unveils AlphaEarth Foundations, an AI system that processes satellite data 16x more efficiently to create detailed Earth maps for tracking deforestation, climate change, and environmental shifts.

title: Runloop lands $7M to power AI coding agents with cloud-based devboxes
description: Runloop addresses "production gap" for AI coding agents, helping deploy autonomous coding assistants six months faster.

title: Nightfall launches ‘Nyx,’ an AI that automates data loss prevention at enterprise scale
description: Nightfall's Nyx is the first autonomous DLP platform that cuts false alerts by 90% and protects data from insider threats and ChatGPT leaks.

title: How can enterprises keep systems safe as AI agents join human employees? Cyata launches with a new, dedicated solution
description: The growing use of AI agents isn’t limited to technical teams. While developers were an early audience, Cyata realized adoption was broader.

title: AI vs. AI: Prophet Security raises $30M to replace human analysts with autonomous defenders
description: Prophet Security raises $30 million to launch a fully autonomous AI cybersecurity platform that investigates and responds to threats without human intervention, promising 10x faster response times and 96% fewer false positives.

title: Arcee opens up new enterprise-focused, customizable AI model AFM-4.5B trained on ‘clean, rigorously filtered data’
description: Geared toward Arcee's growing list of enterprise customers and their needs and wants — specifically, a model trained without violating IP.

title: Positron believes it has found the secret to take on Nvidia in AI inference chips — here’s how it could benefit enterprises
description: The company’s first-generation chips were fabricated in the U.S. using Intel facilities, with final server assembly and integration.

title: ChatGPT just got smarter: OpenAI’s Study Mode helps students learn step-by-step
description: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Study Mode, transforming AI from an answer engine into a Socratic tutor that guides students through problems step-by-step rather than providing direct solutions.

title: ChatGPT agent Makes Slideshows
description: ChatGPT agent is your one-stop shop for fully editable presentations.

title: Introduction to ChatGPT agent
description: Sam Altman, Casey Chu, Isa Fulford, Yash Kumar, and Zhiqing Sun introduce and demo our unified agentic model in ChatGPT.

title: A Look at ChatGPT agent
description:
ChatGPT can now do work for you using its own computer.

Introducing ChatGPT agent—a unified agentic system combining Operator’s action-taking remote browser, deep research’s web synthesis, and ChatGPT’s conversational strengths.
